ISSUE.TITLE: Print multiple packingslips to PDF results in a file with wrong file extension
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.60.2 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Go to admin area > sales > shipments 2. Select multiple shipments 3. Click the "Print packaging slips (selected)" button 4. It generates a wrong file with PDF extension. But it should "zip" Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/en/boards/topic/96819/print-multiple-packingslips-to-pdf-results-in-corrupt-pdf-file

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: 6620 NopJsMinifier & NopCssMinifier skip already minified files

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6684 Fixed file extension on print selected packingslips
#6684 Fixed file extension on print selected packingslips
